data.description:
BECOME GORILLAZILLA! 

Turn your entire living room into a concrete jungle and experience being a raging monster as you’re attacked by humanity!

(This is a demo game, created to support the learning of the Mixed Reality Course on Udemy (free))

🔑Key Features:🔑
* Engage in an epic battle across your whole apartment.
* Defend yourself with precision in a 360-degree battlefield as enemies close in from all directions.
* Use your hands to grab, smash, and throw objects with precision
* Roar like a Gorillazilla and eat magic donuts to double your strength!
* This game is optimized for Quest 3, but can also be comfortably played on Quest 2

🎓Learn to create Mixed Reality games! 🎓
In only 3 hours, you can learn to create GorillaZilla and publish your own unique version on App Lab! The free course teaches you how to use Unity and the Meta Presence Platform to create an exciting Mixed Reality experience using Voice, Interactions, Body Tracking, and Scene Understanding. Sign up here: xrbootcamp.com/gorillazilla

👨🏽‍🤝‍👨🏻Join the Community:👨🏽‍🤝‍👨🏻
Share your feedback, learn to create the game, vote for the best game variations, and share your most creative feature ideas and App Lab game links. The best developers win Meta Quest headsets and are featured on Meta’s and XR Bootcamp’s Social Media channels.
https://discord.gg/KNnVrwee
